name: us-race-and-ethnicity-codes
title: US Race and Ethnicity Codes
description: This data set contains Race/Ethinicty codes.
documentation: Race and ethnicity describe groups to which individuals belong, identify with, or belong in the eyes of the community. The designations categorize U.S. citizens, resident aliens, and other eligible non‐citizens.

fields.name: Code
fields.description: Unique string representation of Race_Ethnicity code

fields.name: Description
fields.description: Small description of specific Race and Ethnicity

fields.name: Explanation
fields.description: definition of specific Race and Ethnicity
